data.title: Grant Show
data.text:
Born: 27-Feb-1962

Birthplace: Detroit, MI

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Jake Hanson on Melrose Place

Father: Ed Show

Mother: Kathleen

Sister: Kelly (older)

Girlfriend: Laura Leighton (actress, dated 1993-96)

Wife: Pollyanna McIntosh (b. 1979, m. 17-Jul-2004, div. 2010)

Wife: Katherine LaNasa (actress, m. 18-Aug-2012)

High School: Samuel Ayer High School

University: Theater Arts, University of California at Los Angeles

TELEVISION

Big Love Goji Guru (2011)

Accidentally on Purpose James (2009-10)

Private Practice Archer Montgomery (2008-11)

Swingtown Tom Decker (2008)

Dirt Jack Dawson (2007)

Point Pleasant Lucas Boyd (2005-06)

Strong Medicine Ben Sanderson (2004)

Melrose Place Jake Hanson (1992-97)

True Blue Officer Casey Pierce (1989-90)

Ryan's Hope Rick Hyde (1984-87)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Possession (30-Aug-2012)

Born to Race (2011)

The Girl Next Door (19-Jul-2007)

Texas (1994) · Travis
